# The `SimpleLoopSafetyInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Simple and conservative implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> that can give false-positive answers to its queries in order to avoid complicated analysis. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SimpleLoopSafetyInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Simple and conservative implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> that can give false-positive answers to its queries in order to avoid complicated analysis.

Definition at line 109 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h">MustExecute.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### anyBlockMayThrow() {#aa1b6a065ad4fde175bf904917241cba9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool SimpleLoopSafetyInfo::anyBlockMayThrow () const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true iff any block of the loop for which this info is contains an instruction that may throw or otherwise exit abnormally.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h/#l00117">117</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h">MustExecute.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp">MustExecute.cpp</a>.

### blockMayThrow() {#aa597e2048da52105c845e3402b082f5b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SimpleLoopSafetyInfo::blockMayThrow (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true iff the block <code>BB</code> potentially may throw exception.

It can be false-positive in cases when we want to avoid complex analysis.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h">MustExecute.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp">MustExecute.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### computeLoopSafetyInfo() {#a262c2df9639d3f71b8d2a8158b819809}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SimpleLoopSafetyInfo::computeLoopSafetyInfo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; CurLoop)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Computes safety information for a loop checks loop body &amp; header for the possibility of may throw exception, it takes <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> and loop as argument.

Updates safety information in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a> argument. Note: This is defined to clear and reinitialize an already initialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopsafetyinfo">LoopSafetyInfo</a>. Some callers rely on this fact.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mustexecute-h">MustExecute.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mustexecute-cpp">MustExecute.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true if the instruction in a loop is guaranteed to execute at least once.
